page.title: 03Rogart - Home Life
page.content: I get up at 8.00a.m., dress in a knee-length skirt, blouse and a jumper and go downstairs. I eat toast and cornflakes for my breakfast and drink a cup of tea. Once I've packed my books into my school-bag, I walk about 90 metres to get the school car, which comes at 9.10a.m.. The school is about 5 miles from my house. School starts at 9.30a.m. and finishes at 3.30p.m.. The bus takes me home by 3.50p.m.. I play on my bike until 4.30p.m., when my father gets home. Then we have our tea. After tea, I do my homework. Next, I wash the dishes or do anything my mother wishes. If it is dry, I go outside, but if it is wet, I play on my computer for the rest of the evening.
